title: 3 Solid Dividend Energy Stocks That Surged Since the Pandemic
author: Zacks Investment Research; Nilanjan Banerjee
description: Three stocks that are paying handsome dividend yields and have gained massively since the pandemic are USA Compression Partners (USAC), Sunoco LP (SUN) and CVR Energy Inc (CVI).
